abstract: Big chain stores this morning reported strong sales for November, led by department stores. But signs of trouble remain and shares of several major retailers fell sharply in early trading.
snippet: Big chain stores this morning reported strong sales for November, led by department stores. But signs of trouble remain and shares of several major retailers fell sharply in early trading.
lead_paragraph: Cold weather and deep discounts appear to have rescued retailers from what threatened to be a dreary November  but it may not be enough to save the entire holiday shopping season.

headline.main: Retailers Post Gains, but They May Be Brief
